Key Match Events: Jeffery Vandersay took 6 wickets for 33 runs
Avishka Fernando and Kusal Mendis stitched a 74-run stand for the second wicket
Washington Sundar removed Avishka Fernando and Kusal Mendis in successive deliveries
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at R. Premadasa Stadium in Colombo
Others: The match was the second ODI of the series, with Sri Lanka taking an unassailable 1-0 lead
